PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-15812010-12-09,  ,  JUS,  , 
ActContraventions Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Application of Provincial Laws Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the APPLICATION OF PROVINCIAL LAWS REGULATIONS, in order to facilitate its readability, eliminate any ambiguity about the amount of fines that may be entered on the various statements of offence prescribed under Quebec's Code of Penal Procedure and confirm access to justice in the official language of offenders, which already exists in the province of Quebec.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0302 Publication Date: 2010-12-22
AttachmentsAttachment
